name: Cluster of Three
description:
Three layered porcelain slipcast vessels; tiny shallow, small shallow, medium shallow. 

Can be displayed within each other or apart.

Medium Shallow: D: 9cm H:3.5cm
Exterior: dark grey
Interior: mid grey
Black, grey, teal and white striped rim. 

Small Shallow: D:7cm, H:2.5cm 
Exterior: Teal
Interior:light grey
Black, white and grey striped rim.  

Tiny Shallow: D:4.5cm H: 2cm
Exterior: white
Interior: teal
Black and striped rim. 

This product is handmade in my studio in Manchester. I use a parian semi-porcelain slip to create the vessels, which are slipcast in layers using my trademark colour palette. Vessels are high fired which means they are waterproof even when left unglazed, meaning they are suitable for food use if desired.

name: Mini row on oak
description:
Three tiny vessels on a oak block

Three tiny layered porcelain slipcast vessels:

1.White exterior, dark grey interior with black and white striped rim

2.Teal exterior, light grey interior with striped black, grey, teal and white striped rim
3. Dark grey exterior, light grey interior with teal, white and black striped rim
 
Vessels are D:4.5cm, H: 4.5cm each, Wooden block 20cm x 4cm x 4cm 


This product is handmade in my studio in Manchester. I use a parian semi-porcelain slip to create the vessels, which are slipcast in layers using my trademark colour palette. Vessels are high fired which means they are waterproof even when left unglazed, meaning they are suitable for food use if desired.

name: Row with tiny glazed vessels
description:
Row of five tiny layered semi-porcelain slipcast vessels, each with shiny glazed interiors on a block of mahogany wood

Wooden block L:29.5cm H:4cm D: 4cm
Tiny shallow vessels D:4.5cm H: 4.5cm

Vessel colours:
1. Teal exterior, grey interior- clear glazed, black and white striped rim
2. Yellow exterior, dark grey interior-clear glazed, black white and grey striped rim
3. Grey exterior, green/ grey interior-clear glazed, black and white striped rim
4. White exterior, teal interior- clear glazed, white and black striped rim
5. Light grey exterior, very light grey interior-clear glazed, white teal and black striped rim

name: Cluster Of Three- part glazed
description:
Three layered semi-porcelain slipcast vessels; tiny shallow, small shallow, medium shallow. 

In this set two of the vessels have a shiny transparent glaze on the interior surface, adding a contrasting finish to the matt unglazed surfaces. 

Can be displayed within each other or apart.

Medium Shallow: D: 9cm H:3.5cm
Exterior: white
Interior:light grey/green- glazed
Black, grey and white striped rim. 

Small Shallow: D:7cm, H:2.5cm 
Exterior: dark grey
Interior: mid grey
Black, white and green/grey striped rim.  

Tiny Shallow: D:4.5cm H: 2cm
Exterior: white
Interior: dark grey- glazed
Black, white and teal striped rim. 


This product is handmade in my studio in Manchester. I use a parian semi-porcelain slip to create the vessels, which are slipcast in layers using my trademark colour palette. Vessels are high fired which means they are waterproof even when left unglazed, meaning they are suitable for food use if desired.

name: Tiny vessel with numbering
description:
Tiny layered semi porcelain slipcast vessel with number decals.

Tiny vessel with numbering, each number signifies the amount of time each layer of slip was left in the mould. A visual representation of the making process.

D:4.5cm, H: 4.5cm

Exterior: teal
Interior: dark grey
Black and white striped rim
